verses.verse: The <S%H9294>oracle<s%> of <S%H5210>Nineveh.<s%> The <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H2377>vision<s%> of <S%H5151>Nahum<s%> the <S%H512>Elkoshite.<s%>

A <S%H7072>jealous<s%> and <S%H5358>avenging<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H5358>avenging<s%> and <S%H1167>wrathful.<s%> <S%H2534><s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5358>takes<s%> <S%H5358>vengeance<s%> on His <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> And He <S%H5201>reserves<s%> <S%H2534>wrath<s%> for His <S%H340>enemies.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H3581>power,<s%> And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will by <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5352>means<s%> <S%H5352>leave<s%> [the guilty] <S%H5352>unpunished.<s%> In <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%> and <S%H8183>storm<s%> is His <S%H1870>way,<s%> And <S%H6051>clouds<s%> are the <S%H80>dust<s%> beneath His <S%H7272>feet.<s%>

He <S%H1605>rebukes<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> and <S%H3001>makes<s%> it <S%H3001>dry;<s%> He <S%H9162>dries<s%> up <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers.<s%> <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> and <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> <S%H535>wither;<s%> The <S%H6525>blossoms<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> <S%H535>wither.<s%>

<S%H2022>Mountains<s%> <S%H7493>quake<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of Him, And the <S%H1389>hills<s%> <S%H4127>dissolve;<s%> Indeed the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H5375>upheaved<s%> by His <S%H6440>presence,<s%> The <S%H8398>world<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> in it.

<S%H4310>Who<s%> can <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> His <S%H2195>indignation<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> can <S%H6965>endure<s%> the <S%H2740>burning<s%> of His <S%H639>anger<s%>? His <S%H2534>wrath<s%> is <S%H5413>poured<s%> out like <S%H784>fire,<s%> And the <S%H6697>rocks<s%> are <S%H5422>broken<s%> up by Him.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H2896>good,<s%> A <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> And He <S%H3045>knows<s%> those who <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in Him.

But with an <S%H5674>overflowing<s%> <S%H7858>flood<s%> He will <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H3617>complete<s%> <S%H3617>end<s%> of its <S%H4725>site,<s%> And will <S%H7291>pursue<s%> His <S%H340>enemies<s%> into <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>

<S%H4100>Whatever<s%> you <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> He will <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H3617>complete<s%> <S%H3617>end<s%> of it. <S%H6869>Distress<s%> will not <S%H6965>rise<s%> up <S%H6471>twice.<s%>

<S%H5704>Like<s%> <S%H5440>tangled<s%> <S%H9359>thorns,<s%> And like those who are <S%H9352>drunken<s%> with their <S%H5435>drink,<s%> They are <S%H398>consumed<s%> As <S%H7179>stubble<s%> <S%H4392>completely<s%> <S%H3002>withered.<s%>
From you has <S%H3318>gone<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> One who <S%H2803>plotted<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> A <S%H1100>wicked<s%> <S%H3289>counselor.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H518>"Though<s%> they are at <S%H8003>full<s%> [strength] and <S%H3651>likewise<s%> <S%H7227>many,<s%> Even <S%H3651>so,<s%> they will be <S%H1494>cut<s%> <S%H1494>off<s%> and <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>away.<s%> Though I have <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> you, I will <S%H6031>afflict<s%> you <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer.<s%>
"So <S%H6258>now,<s%> I will <S%H7665>break<s%> his <S%H4132>yoke<s%> <S%H4132>bar<s%> from upon you, And I will <S%H5423>tear<s%> <S%H5423>off<s%> your <S%H4147>shackles.<s%>"

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>issued<s%> a <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> you: "Your <S%H8034>name<s%> will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> be <S%H2232>perpetuated.<s%> I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H6459>idol<s%> and <S%H4541>image<s%> From the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H430>gods.<s%> I will <S%H7760>prepare<s%> your <S%H6913>grave,<s%> For you are <S%H7043>contemptible.<s%>"

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of him who <S%H1319>brings<s%> good <S%H1319>news,<s%> Who <S%H8085>announces<s%> <S%H7965>peace!<s%> <S%H2287>Celebrate<s%> your <S%H2282>feasts,<s%> O <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> <S%H9608>Pay<s%> your <S%H5088>vows.<s%> For <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> will the <S%H1100>wicked<s%> one <S%H5674>pass<s%> through you; He is <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H3605>completely.<s%>
